original_text: He can see to the ends of the earth. He knows what happens everywhere in the world. He can see to the ends of the earth. He knows what happens everywhere in the world. He can see to the ends of the earth.
korean_text: 이는 그가 땅 끝까지 감찰하시며 온 천하를 살피시며

sentences.original_text: He can see to the ends of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅 끝까지 볼 수 있다

sentences.original_text: He knows what happens everywhere in the world
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세상 어디에서 무슨 일이 일어나는지 안다

sentences.original_text: He can see to the ends of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅 끝까지 볼 수 있다
